channel.description: Recent content in Ken Jeong on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Ken Jeong to Receive King of Comedy Award From Catalina Film Festival
item.description: The honor is given to a performer “who has mastered the craft of comedy and uses it to uplift, inspire, and bring joy, celebrating comedic excellence and the power of laughter to connect us all.”

item.title: Ken Jeong to Receive King of Comedy Award From Catalina Film Festival
item.description: The honor is given to a performer “who has mastered the craft of comedy and uses it to uplift, inspire, and bring joy, celebrating comedic excellence and the power of laughter to connect us all.”

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ to Hit Theaters as Sing-Along Event
item.description: The Aug. 23-24 select theatrical run is the latest milestone for the Netflix movie and soundtrack’s global success.

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ to Hit Theaters as Sing-Along Event
item.description: The Aug. 23-24 select theatrical run is the latest milestone for the Netflix movie and soundtrack’s global success.

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Review: Netflix’s Surprise Smash Is a Dazzlingly Animated, Infectiously Soundtracked Treat
item.description: Lee Byung-hun and Daniel Dae Kim are among the voice cast for one of the streamer’s most popular originals ever, a Sony-produced musical about a superstar girl group battling an evil boy band.
